comment.text: This translation key is used to display the text "View" as a label for a button or similar UI element. It appears in various contexts, including a Smart Banner component and a filter section on the Home page, where it serves as a placeholder for an action that allows users to view content or settings.

usage.context:
<SmartBanner
 title={t("SmartBanner:AppName", {
 organizationName: logoText,
 })}
 author="Ascensio System SIA"
 button={t("Common:View")}
 force={force}
 onClose={() => setIsBannerVisible(false)}
 onInstall={() => setIsBannerVisible(false)}
 storeText={storeText}
 price={priceText}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Baxın' can mean 'view' in some contexts, it primarily translates to 'look' or 'watch' in Azerbaijani. 'View' in the context of user interface elements (like a 'View' button or section) requires a more accurate translation like 'Görünüş' or 'Rəy'. 'Baxın' implies an action of looking.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Görünüş' or 'Rəy' as more appropriate translations for 'View' in a UI context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Преглед' can mean 'view' in some contexts, it more commonly translates to 'review' or 'overview'. 'View' in the context of a UI element (like 'View all items') would be better translated as 'Изглед' or 'Преглед на'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Изглед' or 'Преглед на' depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ມຸມມອງ" (mum mong) can mean 'view' or 'perspective,' it's not the most common or direct translation of 'View' in the context of, for example, a user interface element or a scenic outlook. A more appropriate translation would be 'ເບິ່ງ' (ber)

The translation "Ver" for "View" is not the most accurate or common translation in Portuguese. "Ver" means "to see." The best translation depends on the context. It could be "Visualizar", "Exibir", "Vista", or "Observar".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Visualizar", "Exibir", "Vista", or "Observar", depending on the specific context of 'View'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "දකින්න" (dakinnna) means "see" or "look" but doesn't directly convey the meaning of "View" in the context of a user interface element (e.g., a button labeled "View"). A more appropriate translation would depend on the intended function. Options include "පෙන්වීම" (penvima - showing/display), "බැලීම" (baleyima - looking), or "ප්‍රදර්ශනය" (pradarshana - presentation/exhibition).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives such as "පෙන්වීම" (penvima), "බැලීම" (baleyima), or "ප්‍රදර්ශනය" (pradarshana) based on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Vyhliadka" can mean 'view' in some contexts (like a scenic overlook), it doesn't accurately translate "View" in this key, which likely refers to a user interface element (e.g., 'View' button, 'View' details). "Výhľad" would be a more accurate translation for a general view or vista.

While "Görüntüle" can mean 'view,' it's more accurately translated as 'display' or 'show.' 'View' in the context of user interface elements (like a button or menu option) is often better translated as 'İzleme' (for watching/observing) or, in some cases, kept as 'View' to maintain consistency with English interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'İzleme' or keeping 'View' depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Переглянути" is a possible translation for "View," it carries a stronger connotation of 'review' or 'browse' rather than the simple action of 'viewing.' Depending on the context, a more direct translation like "Погляд" (Pohlad) or "Перегляд" (Perehliad) might be more accurate. The best translation depends heavily on how 'View' is used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Погляд" (Pohlad) or "Перегляд" (Perehliad) depending on the specific context of 'View'.
